remarks: The base set of an image structure.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jul-2015.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)
statement:
imasbas.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( F "s R ) ) $.
imasbas.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
imasbas.f $e |- ( ph -> F : V -onto-> B ) $.
imasbas.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Z ) $.
imasbas $p |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` U ) ) $.
